Package ohos.aafwk.ability

Class OnClickListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.aafwk.ability.ViewListener
      • ohos.aafwk.ability.OnClickListener

  • public abstract class OnClickListener
extends ViewListener
    Provides callback methods that are registered with the AbilityForm supplier for listening for click events. This class inherits from ViewListener and provides methods to be called back when a clickable component, such as a button or image, is clicked.
    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Aafwk#ABILITY

    • Method Detail

      • onTouchEvent

        public void onTouchEvent​(AbilityForm form,
                         ViewsStatus viewsStatus)
        Description copied from class: ViewListener
        A callback method registered with the AbilityForm supplier for you to implement callbacks upon touch events.

        Generally, this method is triggered in the following scenario:

        1. The developer of the supplier uses AbilityForm#registerViewListener(int, ViewListener) to register a callback method upon touch events.
        2. When a touch event is dispatched to a component on the client, the event is sent to the supplier through the AbilityForm framework, and the AbilityForm framework triggers the registered callback method ViewListener#onTouchEvent(AbilityForm, ViewsStatus).

        Specified by:
        onTouchEvent in class ViewListener
        Parameters:
        form - Indicates the AbilityForm object provided by the supplier.
        viewsStatus - Indicates the status of components for which a listener has been set on the client.

      • onClick

        public abstract void onClick​(int componentId,
                             AbilityForm form,
                             ViewsStatus viewsStatus)
        A callback method registered with the AbilityForm supplier for you to implement callbacks upon click events.
        Parameters:
        componentId - Identifies the component that is clicked. The value cannot be a negative number.
        form - Indicates the AbilityForm object provided by the supplier.
        viewsStatus - Indicates the status of components for which a listener has been set on the client.
